testcase.name: Retrieve a list of posts
testcase.system-out: Given I am a user.........................................................passed When I send a GET request to /posts.......................................passed Then the API should respond with status code 200..........................passed And the response should contain an array of posts.........................passed

testcase.name: Create a new post
testcase.system-out: Given I am a user.........................................................passed When I send a POST request to /posts......................................passed Then the API should respond with status code 201..........................passed And the response should contain the post object...........................passed

testcase.name: Retrieve a specific post
testcase.system-out: Given I am a user.........................................................passed When I send a GET request to /posts/1.....................................passed Then the API should respond with status code 200..........................passed And the response should contain the details of the post...................passed
